p: Le Blanc-Louvry et al., have demonstrated that the massage of the abdominal wall after colectomy without the use of herbal oils can reduce the duration of POI.[ 19] Çetinkaya and Başbakkal demonstrated that the utilization of oil in massage aromatherapy is effective in reducing the symptoms of colic.[ 20] Moreover, in some scientific documents, it has been demonstrated that essential oils were used to massage patients during surgery.[ 21] Therefore, in this study, we aimed to assess the effect of topical application of chamomile oil on decreasing the duration of POI after cesarian section.
